body: @ignasi35 it is nice to include the stack so we can quickly check if it is the same failure when logging ones in the future

(better late than never)
This is the stacktrace missing in the description above:

issue.title: Durable pruning fail fix

labels.name: tested
labels.description: PR that was successfully built and tested by Jenkins

repository.name: akka-core
repository.description: A platform to build and run apps that are elastic, agile, and resilient. SDK, libraries, and hosted environments.

issue.body:
Failed once when the new cluster node had not joined the cluster yet, so start with waiting for that.

References #29270

issue.title: [failed] DurablePruningSpec

labels.name: failed
labels.description: Tickets that indicate a CI failure, likely a flakey test

repository.name: akka-core
repository.description: A platform to build and run apps that are elastic, agile, and resilient. SDK, libraries, and hosted environments.
